CustomField.description: Amount of revenue that has already been recognized within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the Equal Split recognition method. Populated using data from Revenue Management, if you are using the integration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount of revenue that has already been recognized within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the Equal Split recognition method. Populated using data from Revenue Management, if you are using the integration.
CustomField.label: Equal Split: Milestone: Recognized
